entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is waiting beyond the barrier, described as 'waiting' and 'beyond the barrier'.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley hugs Harry tightly when she sees him, described as 'hugging Harry very tightly'.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who will let Harry come to them later in the summer.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron says goodbye to Harry, described as 'said Ron'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione kisses Harry on the cheek, described as 'kissed him on the cheek'.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George mutters thanks to Harry, described as 'muttered, while Fred nodded fervently at his side'.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred nods fervently at George's side.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone who said 'what would come, would come'.

entities.name: the dursleys' car
entities.description: The Dursleys' car is the vehicle Harry gets into.

relationships.description: Harry follows Uncle Vernon silently from the station.
Mrs. Weasley hugs Harry tightly when she sees him.
Hermione kisses Harry on the cheek.
